title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Copilot CLI hooks tutorial for policy enforcement and auditing.
Documented new cache download rate limit (1500/min) and billing details.
Improved multi-disk log migration docs for GitHub Enterprise Server.
Clarified Python JWT example and updated dependency best practices.
Added GPT 5.3 Codex to Copilot Auto model pool.
Updated Copilot CLI configuration and setup guides.
Noted OIDC audit log streaming unavailability in GitHub Enterprise Cloud.
Required explicit values for repository custom properties.
summary:
- Added Copilot CLI hooks tutorial for policy enforcement and auditing.
- Documented new cache download rate limit (1500/min) and billing details.
- Improved multi-disk log migration docs for GitHub Enterprise Server.
- Clarified Python JWT example and updated dependency best practices.
- Added GPT 5.3 Codex to Copilot Auto model pool.
- Updated Copilot CLI configuration and setup guides.
- Noted OIDC audit log streaming unavailability in GitHub Enterprise Cloud.
- Required explicit values for repository custom properties.
generated_title: Enhance Copilot CLI with hooks, update caching limits, and improve Enterprise docs
commits: **db4dd39**: Remove promotional pricing, update multiplier [Opus 4.6 (fast)] (#59615) (by Anne-Marie)
**44ece47**: Clarify Python JWT example uses client ID or app ID (#59668) (by Justin Alex)
**a475709**: Add note about OIDC audit log streaming unavailability with ghe (#59643) (by Damien Butler)
**499c5ac**: Added documentation for multi-disk log migrations (#59652) (by Benedict Ng)
**129f0b6**: Talk about cache billing a little more in cache docs (#59480) (by Ryan Ghadimi)
**aded6c9**: Create "Set up Copilot CLI" map topic #21272 (#59543) (by Anne-Marie)
**621cdf7**: Add more fields to table in "Data available in Copilot usage metrics" (#59642) (by Sophie)
**e229c79**: [EDI] Best practices for maintaining dependencies 2 (#59641) (by mc)
**cf42f4a**: Write a driver tutorial about using hooks to lock down agentic execution in a deterministic way (#59479) (by Sophie)
**f697df2**: Add required explicit values for repo custom properties (#59618) (by Calvin Childs)
**cdc487a**: Bump github/gh-base-image/gh-base-noble from 20260128-000359-ga6d0dc7c0 to 20260213-184502-g77a9fd0b0 in the baseimages group (#59663) (by dependabot[bot])
**d9234cb**: Rename MySQL connection string to connection URL (#59673) (by Daniel Dunn)
**38d6da1**: Adds GPT 5.3 Codex to Auto model pool (#59672) (by Nhu Do)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Copilot CLI hooks tutorial for policy enforcement and auditing.
- Documented new cache download rate limit (1500/min) and billing details.
- Improved multi-disk log migration docs for GitHub Enterprise Server.
- Clarified Python JWT example and updated dependency best practices.
- Added GPT 5.3 Codex to Copilot Auto model pool.
- Updated Copilot CLI configuration and setup guides.
- Noted OIDC audit log streaming unavailability in GitHub Enterprise Cloud.
- Required explicit values for repository custom properties.

### Title
Enhance Copilot CLI with hooks, update caching limits, and improve Enterprise docs
